benchmark_details.name: LLM4DS (Large Language Models for Data Science)
benchmark_details.overview: This paper presents a controlled experiment that empirically assesses the performance of four leading LLM-based AI assistants on a diverse set of data science coding challenges sourced from the Stratacratch platform.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To empirically evaluate the effectiveness of LLMs in data science coding tasks across different problem types and difficulty levels.

data.annotation: Problems sourced from data science coding challenges, categorized by difficulty.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on the correctness of generated solutions and comparative analysis.
methodology.interpretation: Success rates interpreted against baseline thresholds of 50%, 60%, and 70%.
methodology.validation: Validated through statistical hypothesis testing including Friedman and Wilcoxon tests.
